Posted By: MasterOfBearLore (8/23/2011 2:40:45 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Gerrard Capashen...how many blocks was he the main character for?  
  
Not sure whether Karona or Gerrard are more important (one is the Avatar of Magic, the other is the Hero that beat the Big Bad) but neither of their cards are impressive, whereas basically every named Blue Wizard is still good to this day, even if you don't know what they did (the answer for nearly all of them is 'I knew Urza. That's pretty much all I did.' (Barrin, Teferi, Ertai, Jhoira, Tawnos....Urza picked up a lot of random Blue Wizards lol)  
  
Lesson: White Warriors suck, Blue Wizards are broken.  
Because Urza.

@grranet  
Gerrard simply has two different abilities...

I hate him flavor-wise and as a card. The only interesting thing he ever did was [Vindicate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vindicate), and he died. Karn is cooler, Urza is <9000 X cooler, and even Jace can be considered cooler (his card is standard defining/killing)
